A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: you're in for a few good laughs and some nice fight scenes. john boyega's performance was good and daisy ridley did okay. What was really disturbing was to see the otherwise great oscar isaac doing not ok. storywise you get almost nothing. atop of that some awfully cringy scenes\, especially a certain scene with princess leia using the force\, making you ask yourself if that is how the force works. Basically everything mark hamill said was right. What you learn about reys parentage might or might not be true\, because the information came from the manipulative\, lying bad guy of the story. I still have hope for a better back story. R2D2 was right about reminding us: \"help us\, obi wan kenobi\"...
